normalised: ## Tumchea Medical Records-antle Ankde Ukolpache: Ek Rogyancho Margdarshak

Oi soglleank! Tumchea medical bill-ak vo discharge summary-k kiteak polloit ravlani ani tumi ek videshi bhas ukoltai asat oxem tumkam dista? Tum eklech nhui! Te ankde, codes, ani percentages khub gundhgol korpi zatat. Punn tankam somzop hem khorench boll divpi. Tem tumkam tumchea zdravyecho tabo gheunk ani tumchea doctoram kodden boro ulo korunk modot korta. Mhonnun, ami tem toddun kaddum-ia, kitem?

Poilech pavtt, tumchea blood pressure-acho vichar korat. Tumkam odhik korun ekxim vis over exim m-m H-g oxem kitem-i distolem. Uperlo ankdo (systolic) tumchem kalliz martana aslolo pressure dakhoita, ani tollelo ankdo (diastolic) tumchem kalliz dovor sotana aslolo pressure asta. Tea unnea ankdeank target korat, lokanno! High B-P ek ulo naxil'lo marak asunk xakta. Tea vixim uloitanam, mhojem nimnnem reading ekxim tis ponch over exim ponch m-m H-g ailem! Mhaka dista samoso kamich korpak lagtolo.

Uprant lab results-achem sansar asa. Tumkam "Cholesterol: donxim vis milligram per d-L" vo "H-b A one c: sat point don percent" oxem kitem-i dixtti poddta. Cholesterol levels adrxh rokhddench donxim milligram per d-L-antle komi asunk zai. Tem H-b A one c, jem poilea don te tin mhoinea voilem blood sugar dakhoita, tem tumkam diabetes nasot zalear so point ponch percent-antle unnem asunk zai. Diabetics khatir, target tumcho doctor ditolo. Udvog diunchea khatir, he fokot sadharan margdarshak asat. Tumcho doctor tankam tumchea ekeka zdravyechea profile-acher adharit korun orth kaddtolo.

Atam, medical billing codes vixim uloium-ia. Him standardized codes insurance company-chea bill khatir vapurtat ani tumcheo pro-kriya somzotat. Tumkam "I-C-D-ten: E eleven point nine" oxem kitem-i dixtti poddum yeta je type don diabetes complications naxil'lean suchoita. Vo ‚ÄúC-P-T: nine nine two one four‚Äù jem office visit-achem code asa. Khorench, hem ek khorem bhulbhullem asunk xakta. Tumchea hospital-achea billing department-ak (jeki A-I-I-M-S vo Apollo) tankam sangunk hichkichau naka.

Hospital-antle divos ek dhav-dhavi astat, ani ti discharge summary ankdeamni bharaun asta. Tumchea heart rate (beats per minute vo B-P-M) ani oxygen saturation (S-p-O don percentage) sarkhea vostunker diog diiat. Ek sadharan rest ghetlea uprant heart rate sadharanponnan eximsaxtti te ekxim B-P-M bhitor asta. Ani tumchem S-p-O don rokhddench ponchianvoi percent-antle voir asunk zai.

Tareeko dusrem mahatvachem tatv asa. Tumcho medical itihas tareeko nyallant dhorun khub adharit asa ‚Äì laksyonna kedna suru zali, kedna tests keli, kedna vokhdham dilim. Tumkam tareeko pondhra july don hozar ani chovis vo july pondhra don hozar ani chovis oxem dakhounk yetat, formatacher adharit. Tumchea appointments-acho record sambhallat, vaccination tareeko (jeki tumchea C-O-V-I-D-nineteen booster tevix november don hozar ani chovis) ani kedna tumi nove vokhdhem gheunk suru kelem.

Ani xevttim, dosages! Tumchea vokhdhamchea dosages-ancher khub diog diiat jim tumi ghetat. Tumkam "Amoxicillin ponchxim milligram tin pavtti disa" vo "Vitamin D ek hozar I-U daily" sarkhem kitem-i dixtti poddum yeta. Tankam ekmekam lagim mix korunk zaina ani svota-vokhdho gheunk zaina! Tumkam kitem-i purai mahiti nasot zalear tumchea doctoran vo pharmacistan porot porot vicharat.

Mhonnun, thoim tumi asat! Tumchea medical records-antle ankdeanchea porda fattim ek lhan jhelok. Tem bhiranticho disunk xakta, punn tem ek-ek korun toddun kaddtlear khub somzop sompem zata. Udvog diiat, tumi tumchech borem vakil zatat. Proxnank vichrunk bhieunakat, sombondi sande saf korat, ani tumchea zdravyechem niyantron korpant ek karkun bhumika gheat. Ani tumchi dusri vatt nasot zalear, soglleank monsoon-antlem humak zhunvat ‚Äì to mhuzo soglleank karann asa!
